maha banku bandumkara siddhiya sambandhayen soya balima sandaha pathkala janadhipathi wimarshana komishan sabhawa wisin ho kop kamituwa wisin agamathiwaraya waradakaruwaku kara nomathi bawath padanam wirahithawa gena ena mema wishwasabhanga yojanawa pussak bawath sabhanayaka, rajya wyawasaya sanwardhana amathi lakshman kirialla mahatha parlimenthuwe di eeye (4) pawasiya.

samaharu yanawa niwaduwata, samaharu yanawa gowiyan kamathi karawanna (eeka wenama ma kiyanna oona kathandarayak -passe dawasaka balamu), samaharu yanawa manamaliyo balanna, samaharu yanawa kasada bandinna.onna ithin dumindath tikak manamala wadakata wage lankawata yanna set wuna kiyamuko.

eeth, samahara wita oyatath ehemama nam.

sahaya adhyakshanayen nimshan wirakkodi, nadisha saman da kala adhyakshanayen, saman padmakumara, chaminda gunasinha da wesha nirupanayen, chamara nirosh ha sanjaya da satan adhyakshanayen, samantha ranga mayadunna da ‘hora polis’ chithrapatayata dayaka we.

( me kamentuwa dala thibbe homo sepiyan namin unata basawa kageda kiyala pahadili newa.bhisana kale wage.kola balallu kaha balallu pra ghra nan godayi.habayi gema denne ekama set eka ) pulasthige nirwachane pulul.aagama kiyanne potha witharak newi.peramune rala aagama = potha kiyala bakward yanne ehema nathiunoth aagamika pujakayan,aagamika sanstha korapu waradi wada thiyenawa eewa piliganna wenawa eeka thamunta awasiyi kiyala hitha athulen danna hinda.meka thawa issarahata geniyamu.hitlar goyiya liwwa mayin kamf kiyala pothak 1920 gananwala.meka thamayi nasi buwalage muladharmaya.eeka uda wada karapu porawal thamayi miliyana ganak yudewwo gas kore.(pitiye ralata muslimunta koranna oone korala thiyenneth ee wage ekak newa ) meka pennala nasiwadaya waradi korala thiyenawa kiyala kawuruhari kiwama thawa lokkekta kiyanna puluwan ane naha nasiwade kiyanne mayin kamf potha eeke oya gas korana katha naha eewa kore anugamikayo darsaneta mukuth kiyanna epa kiyala.aathal tharke neda?naha.nasiwade kiyanne pothatayi pathatayi eewa olu uda thiyagena wada korapu siyalu sathatayi seratama.aagamath ehemayi.

pakisthana pilithuru inimedi nayaka sarfras ahamad lakunu 64k saha imad wasim lakunu 50k raskalada kandayama jayagrahanaya kara gena yamata nohaki wuha.mulu lakunu sankhyawa 8k weddi thewani oowaraya yawu bolt ehi dewani panduwen fakar samange kadulla binda damu athara babar asam, ros telar uda panduwak raka ganimenda, mohomad hafis kadulla muwa kirime waradata hasuweminda pita pita pandu dekakin dawi giye bolt ta mangala kadulu thrithwaya himikara demini.nawasilanthaya wenuwen ekdina pitiye kadulu thrithwayak dawagath thewani pandu yawanna lesa bolt wartha pothata ekwiya.
